DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess safety efficacy Cotrifazid treat uncomplicated resistant malaria compare outcome mefloquine quinine+sulfadoxine/pyrimethamine ( SP )
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Open-label , block-randomised , comparative , multicentric trial . Setting : Four primary care health facility , two urban two rural area Madang East Sepik Province , Papua New Guinea . Participants : Patients age recurrent uncomplicated malaria Intervention : Random assignment receive either Cotrifazid , mefloquine standard treatment quinine+sulfadoxine/pyrimethamine ( SP ) . Outcome measure : Incidence clinical laboratory adverse event ; rate clinical and/or parasitological failure day 14
